name: atom-deepscan
description: Detect bugs and quality issues in JavaScript, TypeScript, React and Vue.js more precisely

enable.title: Enable
enable.description: Controls whether DeepScan inspection should be enabled

proxy.title: Proxy
proxy.description: Configures the proxy. If not set will be taken from the http_proxy environment variable.

ignoreConfirmWarning.title: Controls whether you allow transferring your code to the DeepScan server without prompt. Transferred code is completely deleted right after the inspection.

ignoreRules.title: Rules to be ignored
ignoreRules.description: Configures the rules to be ignored. e.g., UNUSED_DECL, BAD_WITH_STATEMENT

showDecorators.title: Show inline decorators
showDecorators.description: Controls whether the problem of the code should be shown along with the code

showFullDescription.title: Show full description
showFullDescription.description: Controls whether the full description of the issue should be shown when you hover it. Applied after reopening the file.
